name: Random Encounters of the Third Kind
name_original: Random Encounters of the Third Kind
description:
First of all, thank you for checking us out!

This game was made using Unity during the GMTK22 Game Jam. Every asset and gameplay were made during 48h alongside my friend GoZ.

The rule of Random Encounter of the Third Kind is quite simple: survive. The game will scale automatically in difficulty so beware! (though you'll eventually become unstoppable...)

All you need to play is a mouse and keyboard (you can use a controller but you can only move with it... maybe you'll like the challenge):

  • Forward: W
  • Backward: S
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Click
  • Pause: Escape
  • [ Hidden feature - Jump: Space ]
  • Game Over: Don't do anything

(The player will automatically follow the mouse cursor on the screen)

I hope you will enjoy this game as much as we enjoyed making it! Everybody have a glorious day!

Cheers!!
